description.value:
Space Marines Only, Deathwatch Relic. Innately Master Crafted. Negates two points of Armour Penetration of any incoming attack. Wearer gains +10 to Opposed Weapon Skill Tests to Feint. When taking the Defensive Stance Action, foes suffer an additional -10 on Weapon Skill Tests to attach the wearer.

Effect: Hero

Notes: 50 R
